website_summaries.verdict: An expertly constructed stroller that accommodates up to two children sitting in stroller seats.
pros: Stroller enables an older child to stand on the rear platform or sit on the rear seat
Constructed from nylon and metal for supreme quality
Large basket offers lots of storage space
Easy to fold for seamless storage or transport

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and great price!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! exactly what i was looking for! It fits our Graco Snug Ride 35 Click Connect perfectly, on the front and on the back. I have two girls, a 5 month old and a 2 year old and they love it and mommy too! I like to take them on my walks on different terrains and they are very comfy and it's not heavy at all. The front tires have suspension which is great for dirt trails. The price is great if i compare to the Graco Ready2grow which is a little bit over $200.
customer_reviews.author: Ana84

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller, did a test run at SeaWorld. Easy to move around and turn. Easy to open and close. Fit in my Versa hatchback great, just had to easily remove the the shade cover. Worked fantastic for my 7 yr old and 3 yr old. Works great with my Britax Chaperone infant carrier too, in the back position. Snug no wiggle fit. The front position didn't work with my Britax, but that is okay since I wanted to be closer to the baby. The basket is very large and perfect for snacks, bags and stuffed toys, etc. Overall couldn't beat the price, quality and weight limits which are 50lbs in front and 60lbs in the back. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work in front and back with Chicco 30 fit ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work in front and back with Chicco 30 fit car seats as stated In the compatibility list. The seat won’t pop in on the front so my toddler won’t be able to use the platform and bench seat along w the new baby’s car seat. The car seat does fit loosely in the back of stroller. We even tried drilling out the screws and making adjustments and nothing worked.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly R

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Easy to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, Easy to maneuver, fast to fold and to open, meets all my expectations! Recommended for parents that have toddler and baby.
customer_reviews.author: Art B.

customer_reviews.title: worked great. watch out though
customer_reviews.text: we have a four year old and an 18 mo old. took this to Disney for a week as soon as we got it. worked great. watch out though, the visor part will pinch the front rider's arm if the back rider shoves it forward. the visor is also long when you fold it up to store/travel. We have an Avalon and have to remove the visor part to put it in our trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Fluffy Pants

customer_reviews.title: Best double stroller!
customer_reviews.text: My autistic, very tall! 5 year old can sit in the back perfectly fine and my 1 year old loves it as well. Sometimes I just take my 1 year old and it’s not as bulky and I can put big bags in the back sit. Soon it will be perfect for my new baby too with 1 sibling at a time. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: jazmin

customer_reviews.title: Decent Stroller
customer_reviews.text: This is a good stroller for on the go. I have my just turned three year old now riding in the back and 9 month old baby in the front. It is a smooth ride and not too hard to close and open. The one disappointing issue is the buckles are cheap. The buckle in the front cracked and the one for the back fell off. I'm hoping to get some resolution by contacting Baby Trend.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: It's not the best but not the worst.
customer_reviews.text: It's ok but wish I went with the 2 seater . this brand doesn't have the separate back seater like some others the car seat bothers either way u have it front or back. plenty of storage and does the job just not that comfortable for my 2 year old my 7 month is sitting up pretty good but the front only has 2 settings which is disappointing but again we are making it work . It's very sturdy tho been on long walks amusement parks it does take up a lot of space in the SUV highlander so minus one seat ... but i guess thats what u get with a double stroller. Would I buy again probley not.
customer_reviews.author: micheal t.

customer_reviews.title: Roomy, easy to maneuver. Okay for bigger kiddos
customer_reviews.text: Knowing we would be buying alot of stuff at Disneyland we wanted to use a stroller one last time. We also have a 7 year old who doesn't like to walk for long periods. Our 10 year old was able to fit in the rear area sitting. Folding was the only non perfect thing about it, but it wasn't hard just needed time to get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: SF East Bay

customer_reviews.title: Broke during first use!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this item. I bought this after falling in love with my single baby trend stroller. Now that I have 2 under 2 I wanted something to walk to the park. Obviously I purchased this item prior to my baby being born and I pulled it out to use for the first time. Half way to the park the plastic that holds the wheel to the stroller just snaps! Luckily my husband was there to help me get back home as I would not have been able to get the stroller home or carry 2 kids back alone... and of course the return period passed 2 days ago.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: The best stroller for anyone who needs something to make walks easier with two kids! My youngest, he actually likes the sit and stand spot more than his sister. He's 2 and really sits and stands during a walk. Our 4year old has started sitting in the front, and with the adjustable foot rest, she folds her legs in her lap and just relaxes, colors etc. And she fits good in the front still! She's about 36lbs. My son is 30lbs. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Faulty and Clumsy
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this stroller but aside from being extremely clumsy and difficult to open and close, the wheels kept falling off. I assembled the stroller exactly as the instructions described but it never failed they would turn and get in the way when folding and pop off i mailed the stroller back days ago and I still have not had a refund issued. We will see what happens. Maybe this one was defective.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Elyse Benitez

customer_reviews.title: Outting smart not hard with minions
customer_reviews.text: Received this today! Super excited to try this out this week as I am outnumbered by little humans when daddy's at work. Easy to put together. My Two year old and 2 month old rode in it comfortably throughout the house. This definitely feels like outtings will be very manageable vs. Baby-wearing and attempting to hold onto active toddler simultaneously. Nice plastic tray and wheels. Love plenty of cupholders. Parent tray was a booger to click (it is permanent) in but otherwise easy to assemble. Pretty narrow which is a plus but a doozy on sharp turns as I imagine other double strollers to be.
customer_reviews.author: J Davis

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 60 lb. 4.5 yr old perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a stroller to fit my 12 month old but also my 4.5-year-old if she gets tired during a long day. We like to take a lot of day trips in the summer to the zoo, museum, etc and it’s a lot of walking! Now I can go anywhere and do anything without complaining! Even walks around the block are nice because I can walk fast, but my oldest can hop on and off as she pleases. This is smaller and less bulky than my single travel system stroller, and takes up less room in the trunk! Front seat doesn’t dig into my oldests back, but also reclines enough to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie A.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work well with Chicco Keyfit30 infant carrier.
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed. Lots I read said it would work with Chicco Keyfit 30 cardseat. It does not work well. What a struggle. For it to even be an option you have to have it in the back spot where my toddler wants to ride (the sit and stand part!). Plus side is when baby can ride independently of infant carrier it might be nice. Really lightweight- I do love that.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Rose Aske

customer_reviews.title: Good stroller
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that out of all the strollers we own I actually like this one. Maneuverability, is great. It turns great and it’s pretty smooth when I push it. My only complaint is the storage. The basket is hard to access and on the smaller side. The cup holders are small and don’t fit a standard coffee cup. I think it’s easy to fold but my mother and husband have problems so that’s why I gave it 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: VACHM

customer_reviews.title: A great stroller!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this stroller for my newborn and three year old. It's perfect! I love that you can latch any baby trend carseat on stroller either in the front seat or the back. It folds up nicely leaving some more room in my trunk for other stuff. It locks in place when folded up. The multiple cup holders come in handy all the time. Seriously, the best stroller for two kids!
customer_reviews.author: Shanna

customer_reviews.title: Easy to move and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Bought this stroller for my 2.5 year old daughter and my 9 month old son in a carseat. It is light weight and easy to maneuver. I love it. My daughter likes to climb into the back and sit down on the bench. It is easy to snap the carseat into place (it is a graco).
customer_reviews.author: Mose Schrute

customer_reviews.title: Great Stroller
customer_reviews.text: Right after we got this, we took it to an amusement park and it did great. We used our baby car seat on top for our 10 month old so that he could nap and then used the front seat for our 2 yo. It was really comfy for both of them and easy to push around. Lots of storage space underneath as well.
customer_reviews.author: honeybee08

customer_reviews.title: This works great for 2 kids without being too wide to navigate
customer_reviews.text: This works great for 2 kids without being too wide to navigate. The older one can hop in and out and it has a nice place for storage at the bottom. It has cupholders for both kids and parents which is nice. The cellphone holder doesn't fit a larger phone like the Iphone 7 plus.
customer_reviews.author: R Lageman

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest
customer_reviews.text: We took this stroller to Disneyland and it wasn't the easiest to use there. The bottom storage area was constantly brushing on the wheels (even when empty) and causing problems. And it doesn't hold much. The sun shade doesn't cover much either. It either covers the front of your kiddos face or the back of their head, but not both. The bench for the older child was pretty good. My sons is tall and he was able to sit pretty comfortably back there. Overall I wasn't too pleased with this stroller, but my kiddos are on the older and therefore heavier end of the spectrum.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! And nearly perfect.
customer_reviews.text: For what it does, it will work great. Plenty of storage, the car seat can be moved between stroller and car easily and securely, and it folds easy. The downside relates to some of the positioning such as the cup holder for the adults that sits right above the car seat location that snaps on. A bump, or spill will cause disaster for your baby. Outside of this, highly recommended for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Strobeck

customer_reviews.title: Great but...
customer_reviews.text: Really heavy!!! I feel bad for my MIL 60+ who will have to lift it out of her car when she wants to spend a day around town with my toddler and baby. Also, it barely fits into my car. I have a 2012 Chevy Sonic. However, it was easy to put together and the wheels glide smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: J.R.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It is very big and bulky.. but it is definitely worth it. My toddler loves sitting in the back. I prefer her in the back so I can see both her and the baby. When the car seat is in the back, I can't see my toddler sitting in the front. Have not yet used it in a store, but I imagine it would be difficult to maneuver. Works great for walks around the block and what we need it for.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller was a lifesaver! Bought this because I was flying alone with a 11 month old and 3 year old. The back section worked perfect for my baby’s car seat that was traveling with us. The stroller was packed to max with our two carry-ons and I used baggage straps to hook on suitcase onto back footstool. From Houston to Denver airports, getting around was so much more simplified! Also very impressed with how small it folds down to.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Stroller
customer_reviews.text: Easy to push, pull, fold up, and load up! The buckles for the baby in the front are also very easy and quick and the seat reclines or sits straight up. The canopy is easily adjusted but moves a lot - can get in the way of the sit or standing toddler. Not a big deal, though. It wipes clean, holds a large bag in a basket underneath, and has lots of other places to stash things (5 cup holders)! I love it and I use it almost every day for my 6 month old and 4 year old.
customer_reviews.author: MN

customer_reviews.title: Hard/heavy to push...
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept of the stroller. Very practical and convenient for both an infant and a toddler. An issue I have is that it is heavy/hard to push...almost requiring two people to operate it. Especially on sidewalks/curbs without easy access. It is also a tad bit difficult to access your belongings from the storage basket once the kids are strapped in...
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Urdov

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything about this except for it doesn't bear weight very well. With both kids on there it doesn't maneuver as well as I'd like. It folds super easy with one hand, has a ton of cup holders which is great, and nice storage under neath. The front position for the car seat is nice and secure but the back is a little scary since there's nothing for it to lock onto. It just hangs and is strapped on, which makes it hard to take baby in and out of it. For the price I still think it was worth it and the little seat is extra space when shopping or being out all day.!
customer_reviews.author: MamaHen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice stoller
customer_reviews.text: I bought the stroller for my granddaughter for her second baby and she also has a 2 yr old daughter. They love it! The 2 yr old sits in the front and eats dinner lol . Its sturdy and easy to move around. It will be easy to take the new baby and the 2 yr old where ever they want to go. Plenty of extra space to put the things they need to carry. Would recommend this to anyone .
customer_reviews.author: cheryl pratt

customer_reviews.title: I waited so long to get a double because I hate the bulk but this is definitely the slimmest one ...
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is a life saver!! I waited so long to get a double because I hate the bulk but this is definitely the slimmest one I've seen and now I take EVERYWHERE. I see about 60% of double strollers people are using are this one too. So nice!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Casebolt

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice stroller for the price! It works perfectly for my 1 yr old and 3 yr old grandchildren where I wanted something solid but not too heavy or bulky. The wheels are surprisingly mobile and strong for their size. I couldn't attach the adult cupholder without tools (pegs are way larger than the holes for them), but I ended up preferring the stroller without the adult cupholder installed because it blocks my view of the little face looking up at me and would make it somewhat harder for him to access his seat. (And who has time to sip from a cup with 2 grandchildren to deal with :)
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Great investment!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is AWESOME! We took it out for the first time to do some shopping and it was perfect! My four year old sat on the seat, and our new born was in his car seat latched to the front. I love it! I will say the cup holders meant to attach at the handle on top were a challenge to try and attach, so we haven’t yet, but it wasn’t too hard to put together. Definitely a great investment when you have kiddos a few years apart in age!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Fits keyfit 30 (Chicco)
customer_reviews.text: It’s dossnt make a hard snap noise but it fits snug and secure and I do not worry about it flying off or anything crazy . It’s the perfect Stroller for my newborn and three year old.
customer_reviews.author: Marnie

customer_reviews.title: Good stroller
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a great price. Weight does matter. Good wheels, and good fit with Chicco carseat. But with carseat, no easy access to the cargo. May need a momma hook to hang bags. Also, it's no too big for a double stroller. But double strollers are big. Feels like pushing a minivan. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Chia

customer_reviews.title: Hate this stroller 🤬
customer_reviews.text: The stroller is HUGE it’s so embarrassing getting on the bus with it cause it’s to big to fit in the designated stroller area! It’s hard to push, the front wheels lock and u have to reverse and turn the stroller back around 🤦🏾‍♀️. One thing I didn’t think about was where my toddler would lay once I fell asleep and I had to switch him to the front and hope my 1 year old doesn’t fall from the backside. I really wish I didn’t get this stroller but 🤷🏾‍♀️ O well
customer_reviews.author: Khadijah Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Really Heavy and difficult to manage
customer_reviews.text: I have another Baby Trend stroller made to use with my daughter’ Chicco infant seat. Since we have two babies I wanted to try this stroller. Unfortunately I don’t think is designed for ease of use because it is really heavy and bulky!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Niven

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and not super bulky
customer_reviews.text: This stroller has been a huge saver. After moving to Korea we needed to get around, which isn't an easy task having two young children (4 and 2). We didn't want to purchase a bulky double stroller again, so we needed a convenient alternative. This was it. Not too bulky, sturdy, very easy to maneuver over sides walks, and most importantly simple to fold up and put away.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Few compatible car seats and little information on this
customer_reviews.text: There is little information about what car seats are compatible with this stroller. The image uploaded to Amazon is actually too small to read. What good is this double stroller (that boasts front and back car seat postioning) if most car seat brands don’t fit in both available locations? Long story short: not worth it. I’m returning it and getting a more universally compatible brand.
customer_reviews.author: Nidia

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller and the price is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller! I tried looking for something like this locally at Target and Walmart and it was never there! The shipping was quick! Got this for a 2 and 4-year-old and it is great! Tons of cupholders and folds easily! The only thing is that the brakes are a little wonky!
customer_reviews.author: Savannah B

customer_reviews.title: Budget friendly and ok quality.
customer_reviews.text: The Britax Bsafe does not fit this stroller. I believe the manufacturer has updated the description to reflect that is only fits the Britax Chaperone which is an old version. All of the cupholders were great and it appeared practical however I am not for sure about the durability and longevity. You get what you pay for. It is not the quality of city select or MacClaren etc but it is a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott

customer_reviews.title: An absolute must buy for practical mom's!
customer_reviews.text: I've taken this stroller all over the world and its been tossed under so mane aircraft, taxis, trunks, back of the truck, and it is still going strong!!! It's my fav stroller ever!! Best quality durability and function for the money...no need to spend a ton on a stroller this one is great!!! I'd buy this Same stroller again in a heartbeat!!!
customer_reviews.author: C kaegi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I love the pink and black. My baby's black infant seat will go well with it as well as all of her Minnie Mouse stuff. I can't wait to give this a try. I ha e a 6.5 year old as well and he doesn't really need the sit and stand part, but I could see it coming in handy for a quick seat for him of needed while out on long walks or field trips.
customer_reviews.author: Paulina Jones

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I have a 6 month old and a 5 year old. The sit stand stop dose hold him but it’s not super comfortable for him. And it dose not turn easy. It is also heavy. But I needed something they could use with two kids and this works. I just wish it worked better.
customer_reviews.author: D. Towns

customer_reviews.title: My back wheel keeps popping off. I’m very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I dislike the fact that the back wheel never worked the wheel literally comes off all the time all day I’m fighting with the wheel. I might as well carry my children with all the hassle. I use the stroller because I have a disabled son who can barely walk and I just had a newborn it helps transporting both from my apartment to the car , and around the hospital weekly for his treatments and follow up appointments. I wish I could get an replacement I love this stroller
customer_reviews.author: Tan

customer_reviews.title: Great idea for those with two small children and easy ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my niece who is a first time mother, but also a prime daycare giver to her niece who is one year older than her baby. She loves the lightness of it and the ease of putting it into the car. And since the older child loves to be more independent, she loves how my older great-niece can stand and pretend she is flying!! Great idea for those with two small children and easy to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: K. Boyd-McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to assemble, just snap on the wheels and the trays and it's ready to go. It folds up smaller than I thought, so it fits just as well in my car as my travel system stroller. Both my girls love it, and I'm happy I don't have a toddler whining to be carried after walking for 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Christina C.

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Toddler loves to sit on bench
customer_reviews.text: 2.5 year old and newborn. Works great! Toddler loves to sit on bench. Easy for him to get in and out. But very bulky. I’ve come to terms that all strollers are though. I just keep this one in the back of my Ford Edge and use it when we go to different parks, walks around the neighborhood etc. Would never take it on any trips. Way too bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Stroller for the One who wants to walk but can't keep up so STAND is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great Stoller for 1 and 3 Year Old Girls! They are Happy and so is MOM!
customer_reviews.author: Honey

customer_reviews.title: Great Versatility!
customer_reviews.text: Just got it yesterday and took it for a test run at the mall with my three kids. It was a huge success! I love that I can put the infant car seat in it or let it be a seat for my toddler. The versatility is amazing! It’s very easy to put in and out of the car. It feels very durable so far and it was very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke C.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use basket underneath, the stand and sit ...
customer_reviews.text: Hard to use basket underneath, the stand and sit seat is in the way. Have to remove umbrella each time I put the stroller in my trunk, which the space is fairly large. Also, if using with a car seat, it doesn't look in. It just sits on the side rails, there is a belt you can lock over the top of the car seat but still no as secure as something that locks the car seat in place.
customer_reviews.author: AOThompson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The stroller is amazing and it fit my car seat. Perfect for someone with twins. If you are getting it to try and fit your toddler with your new baby I do not recommend it because when your toddler falls asleep you have to carry him or her by hand because they will fall on their face. It is also very big so if you have a small car I do not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessy

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use with an infant and toddler. I have 3 children, one who is old enough to walk, but the other two cannot. It is easy to set up and easy to use. I was able to pull it out one handed. It isn't too heavy which is good. This fits well in the trunk of my toyota sienna.
customer_reviews.author: jan k.

customer_reviews.title: So adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Omg I love this stroller! How could you not love hello kitty. It has a lot of cup holders for everyone in the family. It's easy to open and close. Now I call it the bus because it can be heavy and hard to push once you get 2 kids on there. Not to bad but going through tight areas can be a challenge. I use it for my 1 year old and 6 year old.
customer_reviews.author: jazzy

customer_reviews.title: We like this stroller a lot
customer_reviews.text: We have a 1.5 year old daughter and a 4 year old son. We like this stroller a lot, and both of our kids love it too. It's a bit harder to turn than we would like, and I wish that the frame was a bit sturdier, but overall, everything looks and works as expected. And for the price, it is not bad.
customer_reviews.author: phiren

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! Not easy to close and it fell apart within 4 months. The tires get jammed. I lost 100$ on this unable to return or exchange.
customer_reviews.author: KBD

customer_reviews.title: This stroller is awesome! I have a toddler and an infant so ...
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is awesome! I have a toddler and an infant so I love that the infant car seat can go in either the back or the front and that this stroller can grow with my family. I have a graco classic snug ride and it fits great and feels secure. It's not too heavy for a double stroller and I feel like it drives and maneuvers as easily as a single depending on the weight of you children.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SO easy with two children
customer_reviews.text: SO easy with two children, and smaller than a double stroller... My toddler loves being able to stand or sit and do her thing, and my baby loves being able to see everything. Tons of cup holders, room for one large diaper bag, and you can recline/sit up the baby. Also super easy to set up, i often set it up with one hand
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Moore

customer_reviews.title: Nice purchase
customer_reviews.text: Not a ton of storage but not really a big deal. We have a 4 year old and a newborn and this works great for walking to the park down the road and will be good for farmers markets, parades, etc. it maneuvers and makes turns very well for how big it is.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi L.

customer_reviews.title: Good Stroller for Baby and Toddler
customer_reviews.text: Love the concept of the stroller. I like that you can place the carseat in the rear close to you and sit your toddler in the front. The only issue for me is when placing the carseat in the rear, the carseat is too much in a seated position which I feel isn't good for a newborn. The front seat also does not incline much (Not a big problem for me but something to keep in mind for when child falls asleep).. This allows enough room in the back for a child to sit on the bench. Overall good stroller for a baby and toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Must have for younger/older kids.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Purchased for sis who has infant and 2 year old. She didnt have the same carseat and hers fit as it was same brand. 2 yr can stand and little straps keep him in place or sit and use straps to keep him seated. All around great system and vaule well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Vixen Wench

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: Came fast and box was in good shape. Stroller it self works good, very light weight, my only complaint is that it won't stand up on it's own when folded, you have to lay it down. But other than that I like it.
customer_reviews.author: manning

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but could be better.
customer_reviews.text: The only issues I have is the under storage doesn't hold much, and I wish the back of the seat was a bit taller and laid back a little more. My two year old who is 23lbs, her head sticks up further than the seat when she is sitting in it. I have a blanket that I have to use around her head when she falls asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Diaz

customer_reviews.title: The best stroller
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable stroller for when I go outside with my toddlers... I can also use it even when I go with one of my kids out ! It is light and easy to “drive” it ! very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: kla

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous for using baby basket
customer_reviews.text: This stroller very good for two toddler but not very safe for baby basket. When I use it I put my baby’s basket on the rear face position. And nobody sit in front of seat, it is very easy fall over. Dangerous for baby.
customer_reviews.author: Miya

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller!
customer_reviews.text: Great investment! I love this stroller!!! It’s so convenient and easy. Sometimes I just wish that I could flip the front seat around so that the kids could face each other.
customer_reviews.author: Abriah Todd

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stroller. Yes, it is bulky to store in the house or a vehicle. Yes, it feels like you're pushing a stroller limousine. BUT,Walmart offers this stroller for $169, while Amazon offers it for $88. This stroller has a ton of storage, pushes and rides comfortably and easily folds up. It has been a lifesaver for my family.
customer_reviews.author: Aynot

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller! I have talk kids and a regular double stroller doesn’t fit my 3 year old. The 2 year old sits in the front and the older rides on back. It has a seat belt but it’s not teally that secure. More to keep the kid from spontainiously taking off on you when you stop
customer_reviews.author: Titania56

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Works on our gravel road, can’t wait to try it in town! I currently use it with a three year old and a new born in her seat. It will definitely work when she is bigger
customer_reviews.author: Linds_ann

customer_reviews.title: Hammer needed for assembly
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! My five year old is loving it! I used the b safe car seat at the back and it fits perfect. The only downfall is that it was really hard to assemble the parent tray, I needed a hammer to do the job..
customer_reviews.author: Another person

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for my 2 year old and soon to be newborn.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. Its so pretty and affordable. I had no trouble putting it together. To fold it was super easy. It doesnt take up much space. I have a 2 year omd and soon a newborn so It was just what I needed. I do recommend buying a baby trend carseat for it so it would latch better.
customer_reviews.author: Felix

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful stroller. Very mobile
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful stroller. Very mobile, it is not as long as some of the other double strollers. Front wheels rotate easily making it very easy to maneuver. Frame is light weight (compared to other double strollers). It's easy to fold. Seating arrangement is perfect if you have two kids that are 1 to 3 years apart. Might not work so good for twins.
customer_reviews.author: I. Bajwa

customer_reviews.title: It works for the price
customer_reviews.text: Can not fit a lot in the carriage. It does the job and good for the price. The front seat does not stay in up right position due to the way the mechanism works. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you have plenty of room in your car
customer_reviews.text: Wish the front seat could recline. That is my main complaint with most strollers. It’s pretty heavy. But I guess what do you expect w it being a two seater.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but I do not love the way that my Chicco infant seat rest in ...
customer_reviews.text: Does the job for 2 kids, but I do not love the way that my Chicco infant seat rest in the stroller. I like the idea of the stroller being so versatile, maybe i will like it more when my baby is old enough not use her car seat on the back portion of it.
customer_reviews.author: ernie arana

customer_reviews.title: Great for two toddler children, not a lot of storage space
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand. It’s like my third sit and stand and first sports version. The price was the reason I bought it but I wish it came with better storage not only under but where we can hold baby bottles or water bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising!
customer_reviews.text: The final image of the product as found at the top of the page falsely advertises an umbrella and forward facing capability for the back seat. This is not possible and apparently you cannot add it on to the product afterwards. We bought this so both kids could possibly sleep in this when out places.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy
customer_reviews.text: Love our stroller! The only complaint is that the bottom storage compartment gets messed up each time I fold the stroller back up
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great for a toddler and baby!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing a versatile stroller for the price. The lower basket can easily hold a full size diaper bag and a good size purse with a little room to spair. Rides very smooth. Lightweight for a double stroller as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Ybarra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for newborn and toddler
customer_reviews.text: I have a two year old and a newborn and this stroller is truly perfect. The handling is great, it's a bit heavy but that's to be expected from a double stroller! Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Johnny G.

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller for parents of 2!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller!! Have a 4 mo and 20 mo old!!! This is perfect for us!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Good storage
customer_reviews.text: The stroller isnt like top of the line, turns on a dime but it has good qualities. My daughter could sit forward or kick back in it and the stand area is a great place for a purse. We also loaded towels and stuff on it for the beach. I like that it has a tray. Its a good buy for the price. Its pretty long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I have three children, but one is 1 month and the other is 13 months. This product has been so useful. And I already have a car seat so it was perfect that I could just put that in. And the toddler seat in the front has a tray so that she can have snacks or drinks. And when they are older younger one can sit in the front and my older one can sit on the seat where you put the car seat.
customer_reviews.author: megan l.

customer_reviews.title: Great investment!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was quite pleased with this stroller...And my twin grand babies loved it!! They are 3 years old and about 35 (ish) pounds each. We took many excursions with the new rig and everybody was happy 😊
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Schulte

customer_reviews.title: A great purchase for our growing family.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 3 year old and 8 month old, and this works great for us. We only use it for things such as trips to the zoo and such, but it accommodates both of my children plus has room for some extras. I am very glad we bought this.
customer_reviews.author: MrsCareBear

customer_reviews.title: We need your help.
customer_reviews.text: JaredRayburn.com is helping today’s troubled youth with jobs skills training, interview & resumé preparation and society reintegration training. We could use your help and support. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: JaredRayburn. Com

customer_reviews.title: Worked for what we wanted it to
customer_reviews.text: Works well for what we needed. We call this our mini van stroller, because it’s as long as a van lol We used this for our Disney Paris trip and it was great. We have a lazy 6 year old that hates walking, so it was great to have a seat for her to sit.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and handles easily.
customer_reviews.text: My 2 yr old grandson loves standing up while his baby sister rides up front in her carrier. Theirs even a comfy space below (basket) for their dog! Excellent value. My only disappointment was that the canopy was not included as indicated on the box and instructions. The stroller was already assembled before we discovered it was missing. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baby and toddler
customer_reviews.text: I love my Baby Trend Sit N Stand. I bought for my infant and toddler. It works perfect! I love having the tandem for both of them. My toddler is 2 and she does great on the sit or stand portion, I can buckle her in, or she can just hold on. It is long, but what I would expect for a double stroller. I had a side by side before this and hated it. This is perfect for me, and fits in the trunk of my sedan car.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey mcdonald

customer_reviews.title: Best product for someone with 2 children
customer_reviews.text: Best product for someone with 2 children, one toddler one newborn, very easy to set up and fold down, my only complaint is that it takes up a lot of space in your vehicle, but I expected that for a double stroller. Very well built easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: C.B.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller for the price. I have three under 5 and this makes my life so much easier. It’s bulky but smaller than a lot we’ve looked at on its price range
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Nice color scheme. Very comfortable to drive. Kids fit in front (sitting) very well. Kids fit in back ok (standing or sitting). Straps are really difficult to adjust because of the way they are looped through the clips. (Not easy to adjust frequently but once they are set they are pretty secure).
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Relative light weight
customer_reviews.text: It is relative light weight considering it is a stroller for 2. Once it is fold, it takes about the same space as an infant stroller. I wish you the front seat would incline more as it is very uncomfortable for a baby to seat there while asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, but wish it reclined farther
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to use. The only drawbacks that I’ve found are there aren’t padded covers over the straps in the front and the seat in the front only has 2 options for reclining. Really wish it would recline a little farther for impromptu naps.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Proctor

customer_reviews.title: Poorly manufactured
customer_reviews.text: Spent over an hour trying to get the parent tray and cup holders to attach with no success. The holes for the parent tray were too small and the tray wouldn’t fit even with me putting all my weight on it. Also, the cup holders piece wouldn’t line up with the hole to attach all the way. Read the instruction manual numerous times in case I was missing something, but no luck. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: Travel stroller to the rescue!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely helped us during our travel times! Have a 2 1/2 year old and a 19 month old! It worked out well that we didn’t need 2 strollers and just had to worry about one! My kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sejal Shah

customer_reviews.title: Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller. Is lightweight, easy to put away and carried. It took me like 30 mins to put together. Really roomy and perfect for 2 kids. It is kind of long but after you get used to it it doesn’t matter. Plus my kids loved it. I don’t understand how I didn’t buy it before. It’s a must!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Overall good stroller. I wasn't happy that the stroller dropped ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall good stroller. I wasn't happy that the stroller dropped $60 in price immediately after I purchased it but the stroller itself is great. I'm only giving it 4 stars because my stroller came with 2 right side breaks installed so my left wheel cannot lock so I have to deal with the baby trend customer service to fix the issue
customer_reviews.author: Chrystal Bell

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with dented wheel.
customer_reviews.text: Had to use it anyway because it was time for our trip and it was so obnoxious with that dented wheel. Also, I found I didn't like the practically useless second seat. We returned it and got the Jeep side by side umbrella stroller. Love that one. Wish I had the Jeep one for our Disneyland trip instead.
customer_reviews.author: Smarti

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend the stroller!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stroller! I use it for my two youngest children, everyday. I take it to drop kids off at school in the morning, baseball games in the afternoons, I can take it just about anywhere. I don’t leave the house without it. I would highly recommend the stroller!
customer_reviews.author: Buyer j

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves her new stroller easy to fold, carry and store. Practical it evens fits my 4yr grandson. They love it.
customer_reviews.author: JOE V.

product_meta.title: Baby Trend Sit N Stand Ultra Tandem Stroller, Phantom
product_meta.description:
Color:Phantom| Style:Sit N Stand UltraThe Sit N Stand Ultra stroller has multiple riding positions, allowing children to sit or stand along the ride, or use an infant car seat in both the front and rear facing seats. The Sit N Stand Ultra stroller can accept one or two infant car seats, (sold separately) all Baby Trend infant car seats, and select models from other brands to create a travel system. Folds compactly for easy storage and travel, large storage basket, and has a foot activated brake. The unique rear facing seat allows your older child, (up to 50 lbs.) to ride or they can easily forward face to stand on the sturdy stand on platform. The child tray conveniently can swing away allowing even older children easy access to the front seat, the parent tray has covered storage with cup holders, with a second child cup holder for your older standing or rear facing child. Care and maintenance -To clean the seat pad, use only mild household soap or detergent and warm water on a sponge or clean cloth. Check your stroller for loose screws, worn parts, torn material or stitching on a regular basis. Replace or repair parts as needed.

BRAND STORY
By
feature_bullets: Accommodates up to 2 children sitting in stroller seats, up to 2 in infant car seats, (sold separately) or one sitting and one standing. The product has a one hand fold
Stroller allows your older child to stand on the rear platform or sit on the rear seat, care and cleaning - Spot or wipe clean
Accepts one or two infant car seats (sold separately) and accommodates all baby trend infant car Seats and select models from other brands to create a travel system
Stroller accommodates 2 children up to 50 pounds each
Large basket, and compact fold for easy transport and storage. Large removable shade canopy
